main event: An object with a ball of fire at the rear was observed in Myrtle Creek, Oregon on 18/08/1957.
interesting points: The object started as a small light and increased in size to that of a basketball as it passed overhead,The object was tracked for a duration of five minutes,It was reported that a pilot in the area could not see the object,The case was classified as insufficient data,Possible explanations included a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: one black object with a ball of fire at the rear
witness description: one observer who tracked the object
